10. **Retention Strategies**: Companies can reduce turnover by addressing employee concerns, offering competitive compensation, and fostering a positive work environment.

These strategies can be tailored to fit the specific needs and values of different organizations and industries. By prioritizing employee well-being and engagement, companies can enhance loyalty and commitment among new recruits.
